_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Snow, mainly before 2pm. Temperature falling to around 9 by 5pm. Wind chill values as low as -7. Northwest wind 8 to 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
Its a POWDER day! Deer Valley has received 7 of snow in the last 24 hours. For real-time updates, including terrain and chairlift openings, we encourage guests to download the Ikon Pass App or explore the Mountain Report on our website.
